meanings.definition: You owe a certain sum of money.
meanings.sent1: You debes pay back the borrowed money.
meanings.sent2: I debes return the money I borrowed from you.
meanings.sent3: He debes pay his debts to be responsible.
meanings.sent4: The debt debes be repaid to clear your name.
meanings.sent5: Paying what you debes is the right thing to do.

meanings.definition: You must do something because it is morally right or required by law.
meanings.sent1: We debes follow the rules to be good citizens.
meanings.sent2: She debes apologize for her mistake.
meanings.sent3: They debes help others in need to do the right thing.
meanings.sent4: Obeying the law debes be a priority for everyone.
meanings.sent5: Doing what you debes is important for a just society.
